ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Selo's Song of Travel
ygData.msgSnippet: I give him props for once actually.  No one else at Verant has EVER admitted to not understanding Bards. Kit /em apologizes profusely to Harm, wherever he may
ygData.messageBody:
I give him props for once actually. No one else at Verant has EVER admitted
to not understanding Bards.

Kit

/em apologizes profusely to Harm, wherever he may be

-----Original Message-----
From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 31, 2000 2:56 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Selo's Song of Travel


In that case, you'll love his next reply...

">>>You can't twist invis with any other song... it negates it. That
wouldn't work.

Doh! Shows you how much I know about bard songs They are the class in the
game that I find the most mysterious.

-Gordon"

/em rolls eyes

-KS


LOL just another example of Verant not having a clue how our songs actually
work.

Galtin of E'ci
